code: import{validateForm}from'@utils/validateUtils';import{validatePassword,validateRePassword}from'@utils/validator';import axios from'axios';import{useMutation}from'react-query';export const VerifyResetPasswordFields={new_password:{label:'Enter  New Password',type:'password'},confirm_password:{label:'Re-Enter Password',type:'password'}};export const validateVerifyResetPasswordFields=(fieldName,formData)=>{switch(fieldName){case'new_password':return validatePassword(formData[fieldName]);case'confirm_password':return validateRePassword(formData[fieldName],formData.new_password);default:return'';}};export const validateVerifyResetPasswordForm=formData=>validateForm(formData,validateVerifyResetPasswordFields);export const useVerifyPasswordApi=()=>{return useMutation(info=>axios({method:'POST',url:"/verify_otp_and_reset_password/",data:info.request}));};
